verses.kjv: The words of Jeremiah the son of Hilkiah, of the priests that were in Anathoth in the land of Benjamin:
verses.web: The words of Jeremiah the son of Hilkiah, one of the priests who were in Anathoth in the land of Benjamin.
verses.ct: These are the words of Jeremiah son of Hilkiah, one of the priests living in Anathoth in the territory of Benjamin.

verses.kjv: To whom the word of the LORD came in the days of Josiah the son of Amon king of Judah, in the thirteenth year of his reign.
verses.web: LORD’s word came to him in the days of Josiah the son of Amon, king of Judah, in the thirteenth year of his reign.
verses.ct: The word of the LORD first came to Jeremiah during the reign of Josiah son of Amon, king of Judah, in the 13th year of his rule.

verses.kjv: It came also in the days of Jehoiakim the son of Josiah king of Judah, unto the end of the eleventh year of Zedekiah the son of Josiah king of Judah, unto the carrying away of Jerusalem captive in the fifth month.
verses.web: It came also in the days of Jehoiakim the son of Josiah, king of Judah, to the end of the eleventh year of Zedekiah, the son of Josiah, king of Judah, to the carrying away of Jerusalem captive in the fifth month.
verses.ct: The LORD continued speaking through him during the reign of Jehoiakim son of Josiah, king of Judah, all the way through the end of the 11th year of Zedekiah son of Josiah, king of Judah — right up until Jerusalem was carried into exile in the 5th month.

verses.kjv: Then the word of the LORD came unto me, saying,
verses.web: Now LORD’s word came to me, saying,
verses.ct: The word of the LORD came to me, saying,

verses.kjv: Before I formed thee in the belly I knew thee; and before thou camest forth out of the womb I sanctified thee, and I ordained thee a prophet unto the nations.
verses.web: “Before I formed you in the womb, I knew you. Before you were born, I sanctified you. I have appointed you a prophet to the nations.”
verses.ct: "Before I formed you in the womb, I already knew you. Before you were born, I set you apart. I appointed you as a prophet to the nations."

verses.kjv: Then said I, Ah, Lord GOD! behold, I cannot speak: for I am a child.
verses.web: Then I said, “Ah, Lord LORD! Behold, I don’t know how to speak; for I am a child.”
verses.ct: I replied, "Oh, Lord GOD! I don't know how to speak — I'm just a child!"

verses.kjv: But the LORD said unto me, Say not, I am a child: for thou shalt go to all that I shall send thee, and whatsoever I command thee thou shalt speak.
verses.web: But LORD said to me, “Don’t say, ‘I am a child;’ for you must go to whomever I send you, and you must say whatever I command you.
verses.ct: But the LORD told me, "Don't say 'I'm just a child.' You will go wherever I send you, and you will say whatever I command you to say.

verses.kjv: Be not afraid of their faces: for I am with thee to deliver thee, saith the LORD.
verses.web: Don’t be afraid because of them, for I am with you to rescue you,” says LORD.
verses.ct: Don't be afraid of anyone, because I am with you and I will protect you," declares the LORD.

verses.kjv: Then the LORD put forth his hand, and touched my mouth. And the LORD said unto me, Behold, I have put my words in thy mouth.
verses.web: Then LORD stretched out his hand, and touched my mouth. Then LORD said to me, “Behold, I have put my words in your mouth.
verses.ct: Then the LORD reached out his hand and touched my mouth. The LORD said to me, "I have now placed my words in your mouth.

verses.kjv: See, I have this day set thee over the nations and over the kingdoms, to root out, and to pull down, and to destroy, and to throw down, to build, and to plant.
verses.web: Behold, I have today set you over the nations and over the kingdoms, to uproot and to tear down, to destroy and to overthrow, to build and to plant.”
verses.ct: Today I am giving you authority over nations and kingdoms — to uproot and tear down, to destroy and overthrow, to build and to plant."

verses.kjv: Moreover the word of the LORD came unto me, saying, Jeremiah, what seest thou? And I said, I see a rod of an almond tree.
verses.web: Moreover LORD’s word came to me, saying, “Jeremiah, what do you see?” I said, “I see a branch of an almond tree.”
verses.ct: The word of the LORD came to me again: "Jeremiah, what do you see?" I answered, "I see a branch from an almond tree."

verses.kjv: Then said the LORD unto me, Thou hast well seen: for I will hasten my word to perform it.
verses.web: Then LORD said to me, “You have seen well; for I watch over my word to perform it.”
verses.ct: The LORD said, "You've seen correctly, because I am watching over my word to make sure it comes true."

verses.kjv: And the word of the LORD came unto me the second time, saying, What seest thou? And I said, I see a seething pot; and the face thereof is toward the north.
verses.web: LORD’s word came to me the second time, saying, “What do you see?” I said, “I see a boiling cauldron; and it is tipping away from the north.”
verses.ct: The word of the LORD came to me a second time: "What do you see?" I answered, "I see a boiling pot, tilting away from the north."

verses.kjv: Then the LORD said unto me, Out of the north an evil shall break forth upon all the inhabitants of the land.
verses.web: Then LORD said to me, “Out of the north, evil will break out on all the inhabitants of the land.
verses.ct: The LORD said to me, "Disaster will pour out from the north onto everyone living in this land.

verses.kjv: For, lo, I will call all the families of the kingdoms of the north, saith the LORD; and they shall come, and they shall set every one his throne at the entering of the gates of Jerusalem, and against all the walls thereof round about, and against all the cities of Judah.
verses.web: For, behold, I will call all the families of the kingdoms of the north,” says LORD. “They will come, and they will each set his throne at the entrance of the gates of Jerusalem, and against all its walls all around, and against all the cities of Judah.
verses.ct: I am about to summon all the ruling families of the northern kingdoms," declares the LORD. "They will come and set up their thrones right at the entrance of Jerusalem's gates, against all its surrounding walls, and against every city in Judah.

verses.kjv: And I will utter my judgments against them touching all their wickedness, who have forsaken me, and have burned incense unto other gods, and worshipped the works of their own hands.
verses.web: I will utter my judgments against them concerning all their wickedness, in that they have forsaken me, and have burned incense to other gods, and worshiped the works of their own hands.
verses.ct: I will pronounce my judgments against my people for all their wickedness — they abandoned me, burned incense to other gods, and worshiped idols they made with their own hands.

verses.kjv: Thou therefore gird up thy loins, and arise, and speak unto them all that I command thee: be not dismayed at their faces, lest I confound thee before them.
verses.web: “You therefore put your belt on your waist, arise, and say to them all that I command you. Don’t be dismayed at them, lest I dismay you before them.
verses.ct: So prepare yourself! Stand up and tell them everything I command you. Don't be intimidated by them, or I will humiliate you right in front of them.

verses.kjv: For, behold, I have made thee this day a defenced city, and an iron pillar, and brasen walls against the whole land, against the kings of Judah, against the princes thereof, against the priests thereof, and against the people of the land.
verses.web: For, behold, I have made you today a fortified city, an iron pillar, and bronze walls against the whole land, against the kings of Judah, against its princes, against its priests, and against the people of the land.
verses.ct: Today I have made you like a fortified city, an iron pillar, and bronze walls — standing firm against the entire land: against the kings of Judah, its officials, its priests, and all its people.

verses.kjv: And they shall fight against thee; but they shall not prevail against thee; for I am with thee, saith the LORD, to deliver thee.
verses.web: They will fight against you, but they will not prevail against you; for I am with you”, says LORD, “to rescue you.”
verses.ct: They will fight against you, but they will never overpower you, because I am with you and I will rescue you," declares the LORD.
